first_para: David Ward (born 24 June 1953) is a British Liberal Democrat politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bradford East. He became the MP for Bradford East after being a councillor for Idle and Thackley ward in Bradford for 26 years.

full.extract:
David Ward (born 24 June 1953) is a British Liberal Democrat politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bradford East. He became the MP for Bradford East after being a councillor for Idle and Thackley ward in Bradford for 26 years.
In July 2013 he was suspended from the Liberal Democrats Parliamentary party until September 2013 after questioning the continuing existence of the state of Israel and refusing to apologise for his remarks.
full.title: David Ward (politician)
